welcome: Hello! I am {{botName}}. Type {{prefix}}help to see my commands.
notAdmin: You are not authorized to use this command.
notRole: You do not have permission to use this command (required role: {{role}}).
groupNotAllowed: This group is not allowed to use the bot.
alreadyGroupAdmin: User is already a group admin.
notGroupAdmin: You are not a group admin.
notGroupAdminUser: User is not a group admin.
commandNotFound: The command {{cmd}} you have used does not exists, as i am a command prompt bot.
welcomeNewMember: üëã Welcome, {{name}}, to {{group}}! Use {{prefix}}help to see available commands.
memberLeftGroup: üëã Goodbye, {{name}}. It was a pleasure having you in {{group}}.
MEMBER_LEFT_VOLUNTARY: üëã Goodbye, {{userName}}! It was fun while it lasted.
MEMBER_WAS_REMOVED: üö® {{removedUserName}} was removed from the chat by {{removerName}}.
memberRemovedByAdmin: üö´ {{removedName}} was removed from {{group}} by {{authorName}}. Sad to see them go!
NEW_MEMBER_GREETING: Welcome to the group, {{userName}}! I'm {{botName}}. Type `{{prefix}}help` to see my commands.
BOT_MENTION_RESPONSE: Hello! My prefix is `{{prefix}}`. Use `{{prefix}}help` to see my commands.
CURRENT_PREFIX_INFO:
The bot's system prefix is: `{{systemPrefix}}`.

Your current chat prefix is: `{{chatPrefix}}`.
